item.title: Jekyll & Grunt, part 2
item.description: If you read my previous post then you already know I'm using Jekyll to generate this website. Today I want to share how Grunt makes hacking and blogging so much more pleasurable around here.

item.title: Jekyll & Grunt
item.description: I have already tried to start a blog in the past. Do a quick search for grancalavera.com in the Wayback Machine and you'll find scattered versions of lonely holding pages all the way back to 2004: anything from simple HTML pages, Blogger templates and even one broken Flex microsite.

item.title: grancalavera.com
item.description: After many years of procrastination and over thinking, I'm finally working on my personal blog. I'm still not 100% sure of what kind of blog will it be, but I have some ideas and I'll be testing them little by little over time.
